snippet: Jérémy Chardy of France beat the American John Isner, 6-7 (9), 7-6 (13), 7-6 (4), at a Rogers Cup quarterfinal.
abstract: Jeremy Chardy defeats John Isner in Rogers Cup quarterfinal match.
lead_paragraph: Jérémy Chardy of France beat the American John Isner, 6-7 (9), 7-6 (13), 7-6 (4), at a Rogers Cup quarterfinal.

headline.main: Chardy Ousts Isner at Rogers Cup
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Chardy Ousts Isner
